name: Summer Break: Silent Crisis
description:
This was for the Inkle 2021 Game Jam with the theme "You'll think about it" but due to an unexpected sickness, we had to back out. We then decided to polish out this prototype to the most of our capabilities ^^

This is  a messenger Visual Novel focusing on MC's relationship with their 2 friends. This short game has 3 endings.

The team:

  • Programming, Main Menu and Gameplay Bg - Penincillum
  • Story, Art - Jeblyfish

Credits:

  • Color Pallete - https://lospec.com/palette-list/ayy4
